meanings.definition: Organisms capable of tolerating a wide range of temperatures.
meanings.sent1: Eurytherms like to live in places with different temperatures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study eurytherms to understand their temperature preferences.
meanings.sent3: The eurytherms at the party were comfortable in both the warm and cool rooms.
meanings.sent4: The adaptability of eurytherms is like having a wardrobe for all seasons.
meanings.sent5: In the animal kingdom, eurytherms are the temperature chameleons.

meanings.definition: A type of organism that can thrive in various temperature conditions.
meanings.sent1: Eurytherms can survive in hot and cold environments.
meanings.sent2: The forest is home to many eurytherms that adapt to changing temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The eurytherms in the garden were the envy of the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to adapt to any situation is like that of eurytherms in nature.
meanings.sent5: The eurytherms in the ocean are like the versatile actors of the sea.
